body.p: To create a Virtual Machine (VM) using the GUI, follow the steps below. To use VBoxManage, see .

li.p: In the VirtualBox Manager window, click New and follow the workflow.
If you don't see the New Virtual Machine workflow, change the experience level to Basic. See .
The exact settings on each page depend on the architecture of the host platform.

body.p: Once created, the virtual machine is displayed in the Machines list in , with the name that you specify. You can make changes later, in the Settings for the VM.
You must supply an operating system image, in ISO format, for the operating system you intend to install on the VM. does not supply the OS or any license required to use it.
